typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Source
Source derive(Empid = substring(Column_1,1,4),
		Empname = substring(Column_1,5,10),
		Province = substring(Column_1,15,2),
		EmpContact = substring(Column_1,17,15)) ~> Empid
Empid select(mapColumn(
		Empid,
		Empname,
		Province,
		EmpContact
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
SelectColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> output
